entries.value: Welcome to uOttawa's Chemical Engineering Laboratory
Welcome to the Chemical Engineering Laboratory—begin your tour here.
Proceed through the hallway and follow safety signage to each area.
A small prep room with storage and auxiliary equipment.
Explore the left side of the back lab and note the posted procedures.
Review instrumentation located in the central back‑lab area.
Inspect equipment on the right side and check safety interlocks.
Survey the far section of the front lab and identify workstations.
Examine nearby work areas and read the task instructions.
This is the primary front‑lab area used for core activities.
Use the stairs to navigate between levels and lab sections.
Learn how mixtures are separated by differences in boiling points.
Observe reaction setups, mixers, and safety monitoring systems.
Explore heat exchangers and refrigeration cycle components.
This is where text content for the distillation lab will go
This is where text content for the filtration lab will go
This is where the data from the lab is collected and displayed for students.
